reasoning: Molar pregnancy incidence varies geographically: 0.6-1.1 per 1000 pregnancies in Western countries, 2-3 per 1000 in parts of Asia. Estimated global average ~2.5 per 100k total population (accounting for reproductive age women and birth rates).
source: Berkowitz RS, Goldstein DP. (2009). Clinical practice: Molar pregnancy. N Engl J Med. 360:1639-1645
